Returns: Whether input object equal current Session object.
Parameters: @B_java#lang#Object_E@
Object: an object to compare to current Session object.

Parameters: byte[]
byte: byte array of the ECM data. This value must never be null.
int

int
int: length of the data (starting from offset).
Throws: if the MediaCas instance is not valid.

Parameters: byte[]
byte: byte array of the ECM data. This value must never be null.
Throws: if the MediaCas instance is not valid.
processEcm(byte[]).Description: Send a received ECM packet to the specified session of the CA system. This is similar to @B_android#media#MediaCas#Session#processEcm_E@ except that the entire byte array is sent.

Parameters: int
int: an integer denoting a scheme-specific event to be sent.
int
int: a scheme-specific integer argument for the event.
byte[]
byte: a byte array containing scheme-specific data for the event. This value may be null.
Throws: if the MediaCas instance is not valid.
sendSessionEvent(int,int,byte[]).Description: Send a session event to a CA system. The format of the event is scheme-specific and is opaque to the framework.
sendSessionEvent(int,int,byte[]).FullName: public void sendSessionEvent (int event, int arg, byte[] data)
